name: Alarm Spotlight
author: Alucard648
info:
"You are spotted! Run for your...
MISSION FAILED! BOOM goes explosive leash around your neck."
Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: An spotlight, which, if stepped in, plays alarm sound, change all CT_ALARM_SHUTTER combos to next in table and drops enemies from ceiling. If spawned enemies are defeated, secrets open. Can be killed with specific lweapon - hit center spot of FFC to destroy itUodated 9.5.2023 Can be killed by specific LWeapon.
setup: Requires ghost.zhPlace FFC the spotlight should start. Move it with FFC settings and changers.D0 - ID of spawned enemiesD1 - number of spawned enemiesD2 - >0 - secrets unlocked, when spawned enemies are killed.D3 - Killer Lweapon IDD4 - Minimum damage of killer lweapon
